description.value: You rapidly shift the colors of your skin to throw off the senses of those around you. Attempt a @Check[deception|against:perception] check against the Perception DCs of all creatures within melee reach. On a success, the creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Clumsy]{Clumsy 1} until the end of your turn (@UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Clumsy]{Clumsy 2} on a critical success). Regardless of the result of your check, each creature is then temporarily immune to Prismatic Display for 10 minutes.
